name: Stripe (Local)
description: Interact with Stripe APIs locally through the official Stripe MCP package. Manage payments, customers, subscriptions, and more using your Stripe secret key.

inputs.label: Stripe Secret Key
inputs.description: Your Stripe secret API key. Use a test key (sk_test_) for development or a live key (sk_live_) for production.

obtain.instructions:
1. Go to the Stripe Dashboard
2. Navigate to Developers > API keys
3. Copy your Secret key (starts with sk_test_ or sk_live_)
4. For testing, use the test mode key

auth.instructions: Get your Stripe secret key from the Stripe Dashboard at https://dashboard.stripe.com/apikeys
